website_summaries.verdict: Any laptop owner needs a high-quality microfiber cloth for use on the screen and keyboard, and this kit delivers the necessary softness and durability.
pros: Multiple items for a low price, including cleaning spray, a microfiber cloth, and a double-sided brush
Cleaning solution is free from ammonia, eliminating odor
Versatile components, as they work on any kind of electronics, including smartphones
cons: Bristles on the double-sided brush come loose fairly easily
May leave streaks on certain types of screens

website_summaries.verdict: This kit comes with a double-sided cleaning tool that has a brush to help clean in between the keys on your keyboard.
pros: 2 brushes really makes this a nice value for the price
cons: It is a small kit and the tools are not large
It would not be ideal for cleaning a large TV screen

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with the standard cleaning solution spray bottle and microfiber cloth that every other kit seems to include. But while this alone removes the majority of fingerprints, dirt, and debris from your screens, it does not remove every single smudge or streak. HOWEVER, the 2 sided tool that includes the electronic wipe DOES! It's like magic. I rubbed and rubbed at the screen with the microfiber cloth, but couldn't get it perfect on its own. But a couple light swipes of the tool on teh surface after I did the majority of the cleaning with the cloth got the screen looking like it came right out of the box at the Apple store.
customer_reviews.author: LawyerMom

customer_reviews.title: Factory Finish
customer_reviews.text: I'm not easily impressed, but this product exceeded my expectations. My computer is hijacked by my kids several times a day, and naturally, their prints make it all over the screen. I also use my laptop to display recipes while I'm cooking/baking. Over time, my screen became caked with grime that was almost impossible to get off. However, after 10 solid min. of cleaning with this stuff, it restored my screen to a factory finish. My only regret is that I didn't purchase this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: This cleaner has almost destroyed my MacBook's screen.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product hoping it would keep my MacBook Pro TB's screen clean. After using it for 1 month, it has completely deteriorated my screen. It has removed all of the anti-reflective coating and always had a smudge no matter how much I try to clean it off. I am SO disappointed since there is no way I can get my fixed repaired unless I replace who whole screen. VERY dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: nick korvi

customer_reviews.title: Best screen cleaner I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This computer cleaner is really good. No smudges, smears or drips. I cleaned my computer screen and my LCD TV and they were spotless! The cleaner I've been using leaves smears and streaks all over the screen not to mention it dripped down the screen while I was trying to clean it. Not this one!! And, I really like the keyboard brush too. It's soft and gets the dust and crumbs out of the keys very effectively.
customer_reviews.author: AzGrannie3

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning Made Quick & Easy
customer_reviews.text: Prior to ordering this cleaning kit I had been using "Windex for Electronics" spray. Since purchasing this kit, it has been so much easier cleaning my MacBook Pro and my Fiancé 's Lenovo Legion Y540. The kit comes with the spray bottle, a good quality microfiber cleaning cloth and a double sided tool containing a brush side and a soft fingerprint remover side. The kit works great and I have no complaints. If you're looking for a great quality, small and portable laptop cleaning kit then this is definitely something you should consider.
customer_reviews.author: MLillo

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, just not anything special.
customer_reviews.text: Here’s the thing, I don’t think this product is horrible, I just think it’s pointless. My husband told me specifically to buy laptop cleaner, but I don’t see this being any different than a microfiber cloth and basic gentle detergent which I already had. If you want something electronic specific, then it does the job and I’m going to finish it, but I wouldn’t spend the money on it again.
customer_reviews.author: CHarms

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Electronic Cleaner Product for all purposes
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect set for cleaning your screens, keyboards, and those small spaces that cannot be reached. The firm pad takes lint and even sticky stains off gently so as to not damage even soft screens and sensitive keyboards. Best of all, it all fits into a sandwich bag and is all you will ever need in order to make regular cleaning convenient and simple, For those who are too busy using their computers to look for just the right product, this is the perfect gift at the right price. I've given two away as gifts and will now order one for me. I hoe they don't run out. This kit has it ALL! Cathy
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Not that bad, not that good either.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to another LCD cleaner that I had this cleaner is for far not that good. I got to clean few times the screen in order for it to be really clean, and besides that it seems that the liquid it's not made for touch screen Laptop, because since I used this cleaner, every time that I touch the screen it does not respond correctly. Anyway I put 3 starts instead of one, because even tough you have to swipe twice or thrice in for the screen to be clean, it does its works. (Another tip do not use cloth that comes with the kit, it makes the work even worst.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Camarena

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT open the brush
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the multipurpose brush to clean my keyboard, the brush bristles shed and scattered all over my laptop's keyboard and the floor. Some of them got into my nose and gave me a coughing fit. I had to vacuum the floor after this, Stay away from this product unless you are not intending to use the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit because it looked like a good deal. It arrived damaged with the bottle of screen cleaner being half empty and soaked the box. Buyer beware as the bottle of screen cleaner seems to leak if the box its in is left upside down. I would have given this a 5-star review if it didn’t arrive damaged. Next time im just going to buy a more expensive kit. You deffintly get what you pay for with this. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shane H

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for just a spray to clean my touch screen laptop and this came with the spray, cloth, and double-sided brush and really did what it was intended to. The brush was a nice feature because it can be difficult to get between the nooks and crannies of my keyboard, and the other side of the brush helped brush off some of the dust on the screen that readied it for the spray and cloth. There were no streaks on the screen at all and my screen is clearer than I ever remember. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great on fingerprints.
customer_reviews.text: I used this as soon as it was delivered because my laptop was so dirty, mostly with fingerprints that I couldn't get off with anything else. It seems as though some of the fluid had leaked out onto the label, but not enough to make a mess on anything else. I don't like the little squeegy thing and instead just used the cloth on my keyboard as well and that worked great. It got all the fingerprints off my screen which is what was bothering me most and really seems to clean well, easily and quickly. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Aundra-LynTop Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Quick good cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd write a review for something that seems so inconsequential but I really like this cleaner. It did a great job cleaning my TV without leaving streaks and worked really well on my phone and tablet. The microfiber cloth is really soft and made quick work of the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Doh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item to clean my personal laptop, but it just waste of money. The brush is loosing bristles on very first use itself, the quality is poor, the product is not worth of $1 also. Do not Recommend such poor quality items
customer_reviews.author: SRIKANTHA S

customer_reviews.title: TRASH
customer_reviews.text: Throw it away! It is not effective, not easy to use, and definitely not worth your money. It made my screen blurry
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cleaner. I use it to clean my laptop screen, smartphone screen, and the face of my smartwatch. The cleaning solution and microfiber cloth leave my screens looking as good as new. In addition, double-edged tool is rather useful. I got the most use out of it by cleaning inside the crevices of my laptop keys with the brush side. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Small.
customer_reviews.text: The description is a little deceiving and honestly makes you feel like the products are going to be much larger. I don't recommend buying this if your intent is to clean larger screens such as a TV or large monitor. For the price of this you could easily go purchase Monster brand cleaning products and clean everything.
customer_reviews.author: C. Black

customer_reviews.title: Awful waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These things took near two months to get to me. The bottle that came was near half empty. This might be the worst product I've had to deal with on Amazon all in all. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: My computer looks shiny and new now. The brush works great on the keyboard, although I still think compressed air is necessary to get most of the stuff between the keys. The spray, cloth and scrubby thing make the screen look perfect. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Karah

customer_reviews.title: Woah!!!
customer_reviews.text: I went though a big move last year and my electronics gathered dust and grime. On first use my beloved computer had that ‘out of the box’ shine.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: A truly good product!
customer_reviews.text: I had smudges on our 86" and 70" that were visible to all who viewed, close and faraway. Once cleaned, no smudges, no streaks and no unwanted spots. Great job with this kit! I would only add that if you had a pouch that could be attached to the backside via Velcro, then it would be a kit per screen!
customer_reviews.author: AMetz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at affordable cost
customer_reviews.text: The liquid removed without any problem oil marks from fingers. i really like the small double-sided brush with thick soft bristles. It is ideal for removing dirt from laptop key pad surface. The cloth is rather small and more suited for laptops and tablets. I suggest buying larger (10"x10" ) for cleaning TV screens of over 40 inch. I have no hesitation to recommend the product
customer_reviews.author: ro-breit

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Spray works amazing and the microfiber cloth although a tad small does get the job done. The only reason it's not a five star was for the brush that comes with it. Poorly made and not effective at all. Fell apart out of the package with damaged bristles. Do not let that deter you though. Actual product is great and I would recommend it to a friend. Worked not only on my screen but on keys and laptop surface as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: can u  c  me now--------------
customer_reviews.text: great product. using it for dell xps 15. screen wipes clean with towel . also the tools help me maintain keyboard. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: It Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I use it constantly to clean my Macbook and my iPhone. I’ll spray the rag on one side, wipe down my object, then use the other side to help dry and clean any possible streak marks. Highly recommend, especially for a Mac user because these screens pick up fingerprints like crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Maddy Khachadoorian

customer_reviews.title: Works well, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Work very well. It had been a while since i cleaned my laptop screen/keyboard and this solution got it all clean. The brush is a little weird to handle. I am not sure if I will get much use out of it. It fits well in between the crevices of the keyboard keys, but I can clean it just fine with the cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline D.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure how i didnt have this before. Able to clean my laptop so fast and it leaves it spot less
customer_reviews.author: Nehad

customer_reviews.title: This what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Works just perfectly. Never had something similar. Usually, they left marks like a mist and I had to spend lots of time to get rid off.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei-Di

customer_reviews.title: did not receive all of my order
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I received the screen cleaner kit. IT WAS DESCRIBED AS A KIT. I DID NOT RECEIVE THE 2 RUSHES OR THE NON STREAK SOLUTION SPRAY. I should own stock in amazon since we order so many products SO I guess they are entitled to one error.

customer_reviews.title: it cleans

customer_reviews.title: Value for money. Highly effective.

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle leaked or was broken upon arrival, so the box and it’s contents are soaked in the cleaning solution, and I only received a half-full bottle of solution.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, has everything you need in a convenient size
customer_reviews.text: Love the dual-sided microfiber cloth and soft brush. It is portable and efficient. Cleanest my screen has ever looked. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Moxie702

customer_reviews.title: Good in principle but not the best execution
customer_reviews.text: The product is a wonderful idea and does work but if one thing could be put into the next round of edits it should be quality of materials. The after day I got it bristles were coming out, fine. But the buffer part started shredding after the first pass over a keyboard with low and soft keys.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxson Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Laptop Screen Looks Brand New
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I've used wipes before, and they've done a good job. But when I tried this spray and wiping cloth, I was blown away. Felt like I had a brand new screen! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Engman

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic cleaning kit. And it works. SImple
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not streak free
customer_reviews.text: It leaves horrible streaks and then the little hand cloth didn't do much with trying to rub out the streaks. Looks like a product buildup. I was really looking forward to this actually working like I had expected...I had to continuously wipe at it and spray it down until I had to settle for unwanted inevitable results.
customer_reviews.author: Tavarus Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had ruined my computer screen with windex and paper towels. It had big smudge areas that looked like scratches and wouldn't come off. Before I bought a new monitor I figured I would try this and it worked! My screen looks flawless. I can't recommend this product enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Price is not great but it is a good product. Works really well.

customer_reviews.title: Really works.
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit. Helps keep my monitor spotless and maintain my keyboard dust free. Received product as scheduled. Nice, no frills, get the job done product.

customer_reviews.title: very okay
customer_reviews.text: Very okay, totally leaves a subtile residue behind.... aka ew, not why I bought the product. The little brush thing is kinda cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it a couple times so far but does just what it's supposed to do! We moved offices and now my two monitors are facing a window and I could see all the streaks I couldn't before from cleaning my screens with just any old thing. Much better now!

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works. I smoke . Flat screen gets kinda messy. This works awesome 👍

customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my laptopp/monitor screens well and I can clean my keyboard too with the double sided tool.

customer_reviews.title: Its what I ordered.

customer_reviews.title: Item damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item damaged. The broken plastic cut my hand as I was taking it out of the box.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't think I'd review this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed. Any remaining marks on my screen are the result of poor care (I use this as my university laptop/travel with it very frequently), and cannot be expected to be simply "wiped away." I should have taken before pictures, because the difference is astounding. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: You want this stuff and you need to stop.
customer_reviews.text: Very seldom you find a product that performs Beyond your expectations, this product is Great I have always had great problems trying to keep my laptop screen and the screen on my iPhone clean. nothing seemed to work, this stuff does it easily and quickly and they stay clean. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ed.N

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kit To Clean Screens!
customer_reviews.text: I just look how this Cleaning Kit comes with all of the essentials to keep my Computer Screens clean. After being on the computer all day for work, I just spray & quickly clean all of my monitors. Also it doesn't leak any ugly Streaks which is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Rad Essentialz

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: After trying some screen wipes for our television, I had to find another product to use. The wipes didn't get the finger prints off the screen (and with small children around, there's always prints on everything). After reading about the product, I decided to give it a try. The day it arrived, I put it to work. The spray and cloth worked at getting dust and fingerprints off the screen with little to no effort. I didn't have to sit and wipe the same area multiple times (like I did with the wipes). My screens didn't have any streaks afterward either. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: CMiles

customer_reviews.title: but i guess it's nice to to have just in case
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning fluid didn't work as well as I had hoped it would. Didn't buy this for the added double-sided brush since my keyboard is flat enough that I don't need a brush, but i guess it's nice to to have just in case. The actual cloth is soft enough but I do wish it was slightly bigger than it is. Overall, an okay product but I'd look elsewhere next time.

customer_reviews.title: Little bit costly
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of other products you can buy with same amount of money.

product_meta.title: GreatShield Universal Screen Cleaning Kit, Microfiber Cloth + 2 Sided Brush + Non-Streak Solution Spray [for TV, Laptops, PC Monitors, Smartphones, Tablets, Camera, Keyboard and Other Electronics]
feature_bullets: [THE SCREEN CLEANING KIT COMES WITH EVERYTHING YOU NEED] With included screen cleaning solution, microfiber electronic wipe, and double side brush, you have the ultimate essentials to keep all your electronics clean and looking like new.

[ULTRA SOFT MICROFIBER CLEANING CLOTH IS SAFE FOR ANY SCREEN] The screen cleaning kit's include microfiber cloth is safe to use on any electronics screen. The soft and durable cloth with leave your screens dust and fingerprint free.

[NO MORE STREAKS OR STATIC WITH THE AMMONIA FREE CLEANING SOLUTION] Specially formulated screen cleaner eliminates all annoying streaks and static. It keeps your screen clean and looking like new without the obnoxious ammonia smells of some other screen cleaning kits.

[DOUBLE THE CLEANING POWER WITH THE DOUBLE-SIDED BRUSH] Use the same screen cleaning kit tool to wipe your screen and to dust off your keyboard. The double-sided electronic wipe and cleaning brush gives you the convenience of one tool instead of two.
[LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY] Join millions of satisfied customers with our limited lifetime warranty, backed by our experienced and dedicated USA based customer service.
